title: Vintage "Boston Celtics" Uniform font
content:
Does anyone have a name for this font. It's a blocked athletic font with serif's but the "S" "G" and so are notched. I can find similar without the notch but none with. If you have any ideas where I can find it for down load for free... I'd be stoked. If I have to buy it, also good to go.

I tried to attach a photo?

thank you....

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [boston2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005225233/http:/typophile.com/files/boston2.jpg) | 76.7 KB |
author: klein

comments.content: Player Condensed and Grand Canyon (available form Red Rooster, Phil’s Fonts) are very very close. Ivy League, a face that I remember, maybe very close, but I didn’t see a showing of it at Phil’s.
